summary: Do the candles on Enchanting tables annoy you with their blocky shapes and jarring wax transition? This simple MESH FIX may be for you. WORKS WITH ANY TEXTURES.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][color=#ead1dc][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/42978-1416332919.jpg[/img]
The candles on Enchanting worksurfaces always annoyed me so I made this simple[/color] [color=#00ffff]mesh replacer[/color].[/size][/center]
[color=#00ff00][size=4]INSTALL:[/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][list][*][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Unpack to your game's Data [size=3][size=2]folder[/size][/size][size=2][/size] [/size][/color][color=#cfe2f3][size=1](you should know the drill by now)[/size][/color][color=#cfe2f3].[/color][/*]
[*][color=#cfe2f3][size=4]Overwrite Ruins Clutter Improved meshes if you use that mod [/size][/color][color=#cfe2f3][size=1](see below)[/size][/color][color=#cfe2f3].[/color][/*]
[/list]
[center][size=5][color=orange]Consists [u]solely of meshes[/u] - so this [color=#ffff00]WORKS WITH ANY TEXTURES![/color][/color][/size][size=4][color=gold]
Also, there is [color=#ffff00][u]NO ESP file[/u][/color], so this won't affect your load order or plugin count.[/color][/size][/center][size=4]
[color=green][color=#00ff00]INCLUDES:[/color]
[/color][/size][list][*][color=#ffe599][size=3]EnchantingWorkbench + loadscreen art model[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#ffe599][size=3]EnchantingWorkstation[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#ffe599][size=3]DisenchantingWorkbench (not found in Vanilla but some mods use it)[/size][/color][/*]
[/list][size=3][color=#ffd966]WITH:[/color]
[/size][list][*][color=#ffe599][size=3]Rounder candles [size=1](achieved by the smallest increase in triangles possible)[/size].[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#ffe599][size=3]UV fixes.[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#ffe599][size=3]Smoother transitions from candles to wax.[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#ffe599][size=3]Rounder pedestal/bowl/candle-holders (Disenchanter).[/size][/color][/*]
[/list][size=4]
[color=#00ff00]COMPATIBILITY:[/color][/size]
[list][*][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Fully compatible with any candle or enchanter retexture mod (as mentioned above in giant coloured letters)![/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Fully compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14227/]Ruins Clutter Improved[/url] - RCI adds wicks to the candles, and those are included in these meshes (with permission). Install RCI and then this mod on top. [color=#ff0000]Edit: NOT with RCI v2.9 - he replaced some vanilla candle textures with ones that are incompatible with other mods.[/color][/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34444/]Jeclredured - Enchanter Workbench Table II[/url] - download the patch, install over that mod.[/size][/color][/*]
[*][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Incompatible with any other mod that edits the enchanter MESHES - are there any? Let me know if there's a popular enough one and I'll see what I can do about making a patch.[/size][/color][/*]
[/list]
[color=#00ff00][size=4]PERMISSSIONS:[/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=3]You can use these meshes in your House or Dungeon/Quest mod, just add me to the credits please.[/size]
[/list][line]
[size=3][color=goldenrod]My mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/42978/?tb=mods&pUp=1]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/42978/[/url][/color][/size]
author: LeanWolf
